text: that together have the potential to function as a District Centre. z The site is in multiple ownership, and landowners and developers should work together to implement a comprehensive design-led masterplan for redevelopment of this site, to ensure development is delivered sustainably. Effective engagement between landowners, developers and leaseholders will be needed to facilitate potential land assembly and comprehensive redevelopment. z Landing for bridges from Sugar House Lane will need to be incorporated into development proposals.
